gg.al.logic.component

Class StatComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.Component
      • com.artemis.PooledComponent
        • gg.al.logic.component.StatComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITemplateable

    public class StatComponent
extends com.artemis.PooledComponent
implements ITemplateable
    Created by Thomas Neumann on 08.05.2017.
    Component containing all logical status values.
    Additionally contains logic to updating the values, and queues for Damage and Heal objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Template for StatComponent.
